ctu_text: in/staticdocs/labourActpdfdocs/HBOCW_Rules. pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "The scheme \u201cDisability Pension for Registered Worker (HBOCWWB)\u201d was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana. Under the scheme, a monthly pension of \u20b93000/- is given to the registered worker in case of disability due to any infectious disease or accident at the workplace. Further, it is necessary for the registered worker to have minimum three-year regular membership and is not taking a disability pension from any other Haryana Government Department/ Board/ Corporation.
